attributes.action: Ban Replica Firearms, and also knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are replica guns still on sale?
Surely given that most gun crimes are now committed using converted replica firearms, why have they not been banned from sale?
I can not see any reason for them in our modern civilised society. All that they do is to promote the gun culture amoung the youth of this country.
Guns and knives are such a large part of youth culture here because replicas guns are easily available and knives can be bought over the counter by children.

Time it stopped in my opinion.
